verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:10
verses.text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:11
verses.text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus’ sake, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:12
verses.text: So then death worketh in us, but life in you.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:13
verses.text: We having the same spirit of faith, according as it is written, I believed, and therefore have I spoken; we also believe, and therefore speak;
